definition: pouch/sack/bag/Budai (the Laughing Buddha)/Budai or Putai town in Chiayi county 嘉義縣|嘉义县[Jia1 yi4 xian4], west Taiwan
cloth/to declare/to announce/to spread/to make known
Budai or Putai town in Chiayi county 嘉義縣|嘉义县[Jia1 yi4 xian4], west Taiwan

sentences.english: What you need is a good-sized canvas bag.
sentences.chinese: 你需要的是一個比較大的帆布袋。

sentences.english: A cloth bag is provided to protect the high mirror finish .
sentences.chinese: 公司也提供一個布袋保護高度的鏡子光潔度。

sentences.english: A hot beanbag may be just the cure you need.
sentences.chinese: 一個熱的裝着豆類的布袋正好能滿足你的需要。

sentences.english: Arrived on the bank, see have a lot of fine sand, use hop-pocket.
sentences.chinese: 到了岸上，看見有許多細沙，便用布袋。

sentences.english: When not in use, store the bag in cloth pouch at room temperature.
sentences.chinese: 不使用時，請在室溫下置於布袋中保存。

sentences.english: Long ago, tradesmen sold things in large cloth bags.
sentences.chinese: 很久以前，零售商用巨大的布袋子販賣東西。

sentences.english: However , I am also crazy about Pili Hand Puppet Shows.
sentences.chinese: 然而，我也瘋狂於霹靂布袋戲。

sentences.english: Don't use these for a severed finger.
sentences.chinese: 千萬別用這些布袋子來盛切斷了的手指頭。

sentences.english: I better get the sack and put it over my shoulders.
sentences.chinese: 我還是把布袋拿來披在肩膀上吧。

sentences.english: Meats, fruits and vegetables can be dried and kept in cloth bags.
sentences.chinese: 乾肉，水果和蔬菜可以保藏在布袋上。

sentences.english: Therefore, we call on people to use cloth bags and baskets instead of plastic bags.
sentences.chinese: 因此，我們號召人們使用布袋子和籃子代替塑料袋。

sentences.english: I placed them in a cloth bag, and headed back down the slope.
sentences.chinese: 我把它們一個一個放進布袋中，轉身走下了斜坡。

sentences.english: The utility model relates to a cloth bag dust remover used for continuously processing dust in dusty airflow.
sentences.chinese: 用於連續處理含塵氣流中粉塵的一種布袋除塵器。

sentences.english: For your bag with the diapers, some clothes and a bib .
sentences.chinese: 爲了您的尿布袋，一些衣服和一個圍兜。

sentences.english: Zip them up in thick plastic or canvas bags.
sentences.chinese: 用很厚的塑料袋或是帆布袋將衣服罩住，拉上拉鍊。

sentences.english: Your diaper bag is covered with anime character pins.
sentences.chinese: 你家的尿布袋夾子是動漫人物。

definition: cloth pouch open in the middle, forming two bags/jacket worn for Chinese wrestling
variant of 褡褳|褡裢[da1 lian5]
full and bulging (of a pocket, pouch etc)
